characters

Class Characters

  • java.lang.Object
    • characters.Characters
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Entity
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Cowboy, Diety, Ninja, Pirate

    public abstract class Characters
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, Entity
    Class defining the entity controlled directly by the player.
    Author:
    jlars
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Characters

        public Characters(int healthCap,
                  double speed)
        Parent class for Character Creation
        Parameters:
        healthCap - the maximum health of the character
        speed - the pixels traveled per frame

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public final void update(double delta)
        Method that is called every frame, will call other methods and update other Objects.This method will:

        • This method will update the Character's Moveset
        • Iterate through all Item Objects in the itemInventory ArrayList
        • Iterate through all Beneficial Objects in the effects ArrayList
        • Rotate the Character's Sprite depending on direction facing
        • Call the movement() and timer() methods

        Specified by:
        update in interface Entity
        Parameters:
        delta -

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g2d)
        Draws the character
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics import

      • heal

        public void heal(double heal)
        Instantly restores health to the Character.
        Parameters:
        heal - Amount of health restored

      • hit

        public void hit(EnemyProjectile e)
        Method called when hit by an EnemyProjectile Object.

        This method will reduce the health of this Character depending on the damage of the EnemyProjectile parameter. It will also knock this Character back a set distance upon impact and set this Character to be invincible for a period of time.

        Parameters:
        e - EnemyProjectile that has intersected this Character

      • hit

        public void hit(Hostile hostile)
        Method called when hit by a Hostile Object.

        This method will reduce the health of this Character depending on the damage of the Hostile parameter. It will also knock this Character back a set distance upon impact and set this Character to be invincible for a period of time.

        Parameters:
        e - Hostile that has intersected this Character
